description: An art installation called The Portal was shut down this week in New York and Dublin because of rude gestures and other bad public behavior, as NPR's Scott Simon explains.
title: Opinion: A tale of two cities' 'Portal' pandemonium

description: Ian Roberts has competed in some of the most high-profile races in the world. But his biggest competition to date was a determined 5th grader in jean shorts and Nike tennis shoes.
title: Iowa superintendent and former Olympian bested in footrace by 5th grader
